roleset.name: replace
roleset.note: UPGRADE-V NOTES: No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'replace'. (from upgrade.01-v)

example.name: all args
example.text: Edward M. Esber attributed the decline to reduced domestic revenue because of $4.9 million spent *trace* [*] to upgrade existing software inventories to the new database IV Version 1.1.
example.arg: to the new database IV Version 1.1

roleset.name: improve
roleset.note: UPGRADE-V NOTES: The 'improve' sense is really the same as the 'replace' sense with thetwo objective arguments merged.Member of Vncls appoint-29.1. (from upgrade.02-v)
UPGRADE-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to upgrade.02-v. Upgrade.02 is a member of VN class appoint-29.1. No FN class. Framed by Katie. (from upgrade.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Recently it upgraded its plants so that it could make stain-resistant products with higher quality dyes.
example.arg: so that it could make stain-resistant products with higher quality dyes

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG4
example.text: Formally upgrading the Sandinistas to a democratic status was an initiative harshly criticized in the Costa Rican press .

example.name: with only arg 1
example.text: new equipment, new armored vehicles, fuel for ships and planes, upgrades on garrison facilities

example.name: ARG1 and ARG4
example.text: Over the weekend he was upgraded to fair condition and he was scheduled to have surgery today to prepare what remains of his arm for a prosthetic .
